about_the_game:
A puzzle-like combat-strategy game where you combine runes together to cast your spells. 

Every opponent has their own unique behavior that challenges you to make the most out of your abilities. Each victory grants you greater power, but also draws attention from Death itself.

Controls: Mouse, touch, spacebar
